ValidationRule.description: If Sales Channel value is 209 - Master Agents, then Partner ID is required && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATEVALUE("2017-09-26")
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Sales_Channel__c , '209 - Referral Agents'), ISBLANK(Partner_ID__c), OR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATEVALUE("2017-10-11"), ISNEW()))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Sales Channel value is 209 - Referral Agents, then Partner ID is required
